metadata.description: Explore the living history of Tyria through an expansive collection of never-before-seen concept art, production material, and creator commentary from Guild Wars and Guild Wars 2 that offers exclusive insight into an ever-changing world inhabited by millions of players! The continuing growth of the Guild Wars franchise is detailed by the ArenaNet artists themselves in a volume that commemorates the studio's twentieth anniversary. The perfect companion piece for the millions of Guild Wars players. A complete book containing art from both game, and every installment.
metadata.name: Guild Wars
